welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haan, Germany! This charming city is known for its quaint streets, historic architecture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Haan has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
